title: Epstein Cultivated Ties to U.S. Customs Officers, Triggering Criminal Probe
novelty: Jeffrey Epstein cultivated relationships with U.S. Customs officers in the Virgin Islands through gifts and favors, prompting a criminal investigation into potential corruption or obstruction.
topic: Jeffrey Epstein cultivated relationships with U.S. Customs officers in the Virgin Islands through gifts and favors, prompting a criminal investigation into potential corruption or obstruction.

title: Haverford College Faces Calls to Strip Lutnick Library Name Over Epstein Ties
summary: Haverford College Faces Calls to Strip Lutnick Library Name Over Epstein Ties
novelty: Haverford College students and alumni are calling for the removal of Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's name from the college library following newly released Justice Department documents showing Lutnick had lunch with Epstein on his Caribbean island in 2012, contradicting his claim of cutting ties in 2005.
topic: Haverford College students and alumni are calling for the removal of Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's name from the college library following newly released Justice Department documents showing Lutnick had lunch with Epstein on his Caribbean island in 2012, contradicting his claim of cutting ties in 2005.

title: New Mexico AG Opens Criminal Probe Into Bodies Buried at Epstein Ranch
summary: # New Mexico Reopens Investigation Into Alleged Burials at Former Epstein Ranch
novelty: New Mexico Attorney General Raúl Torrez ordered a criminal investigation into allegations that two bodies are buried outside Jeffrey Epstein's remote New Mexico ranch property.
topic: New Mexico Attorney General Raúl Torrez ordered a criminal investigation into allegations that two bodies are buried outside Jeffrey Epstein's remote New Mexico ranch property.

title: Epstein Estate Settles Abuse Survivors Lawsuit for $25M
summary: Epstein Estate Settles Abuse Survivors Lawsuit for $25M
novelty: Co-executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate have agreed to settle a class action lawsuit filed by abuse survivors for at least $25 million.
topic: Co-executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate have agreed to settle a class action lawsuit filed by abuse survivors for at least $25 million.

title: Scotland Yard Expands Andrew Probe: Questions Protection Officers on Epstein Links
summary: Scotland Yard Expands Andrew Probe: Questions Protection Officers on Epstein Links
novelty: Scotland Yard is expanding its inquiry into Prince Andrew by questioning all his former protection officers and reviewing airport flight records to assess whether they were used for human trafficking.
topic: Scotland Yard is expanding its inquiry into Prince Andrew by questioning all his former protection officers and reviewing airport flight records to assess whether they were used for human trafficking.

title: New Mexico Reopens Zorro Ranch Investigation After FBI Search Gap Revealed
summary: New Mexico Reopens Zorro Ranch Investigation After FBI Search Gap Revealed
novelty: New Mexico Attorney General reopens criminal investigation into Zorro Ranch following Guardian report revealing FBI never searched the property.
topic: New Mexico Attorney General reopens criminal investigation into Zorro Ranch following Guardian report revealing FBI never searched the property.

title: Duke Professor Dan Ariely's Epstein Ties Go Beyond Research, NYT Finds
summary: Duke Professor Dan Ariely's Epstein Ties Go Beyond Research, NYT Finds
novelty: NYT investigation reveals Duke behavioral scientist Dan Ariely maintained yearslong correspondence with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein that extended beyond research purposes
topic: NYT investigation reveals Duke behavioral scientist Dan Ariely maintained yearslong correspondence with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein that extended beyond research purposes

title: Fox News Host Demands Trump Release Epstein Files
summary: A Fox News host has called on President Donald Trump to release records related to Jeffrey Epstein, according to a report published Saturday.<sup>[1](#ref-1)</sup>
novelty: Fox News host publicly demands Trump release Epstein files, increasing political pressure on the former president
topic: Fox News host publicly demands Trump release Epstein files, increasing political pressure on the former president
